body: Who needs Inori when Ayase is so much better. I honestly hoped they got together after episode 5 or developed something after Shu saw Inori go in Gai's room
Someone explain to me how she is in doggystyle
Yeah shu is better, I hate the pink haired girl, bitch toyed with the dudes feelings and in my eyes that's worse than murder, the dead don't feel pain.
Ayase x Shu is 10x better than Shu x Inori :P It's a shame they don't are couple in manga/anime...
